*Last updated: June 2025*

## Current Market Trends

- Home prices in Rancho Cucamonga and surrounding areas have risen **5.2%** in the past 12 months.
- Average days on market: **52.1 days**.
- Current inventory level: **2.1 months of supply**.

_Source: MLS / Zillow / Redfin data._

## Buyer Insights

- **Best neighborhoods for first-time buyers** ‚Üí check out Rancho Etiwanda, Victoria Gardens area.
- **How to compete in a competitive market** ‚Üí get pre-approved, work with an experienced agent (like me!), be ready to move fast.
- **Tips for getting pre-approved** ‚Üí contact a local lender or ask me for recommendations.

## Seller Insights

- **Pricing your home correctly** ‚Üí proper pricing = more offers, higher final price.
- **How staging affects sale price** ‚Üí staged homes sell for up to **6-10% more** on average.
- **Common mistakes to avoid when selling** ‚Üí overpricing, poor photos, neglecting minor repairs.
